settings.title: Account Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage your account settings and preferences

profile.title: My Profile
profile.removeImageDesc: Are you sure you want to remove your profile image? This action cannot be undone.
profile.imageFormats: We support JPEG, PNG and GIFs under 2MB
profile.bioPlaceholder: Write a few lines about yourself...
profile.removeImageError: There was an error removing your profile image. Please try again later.
profile.imageLimitSize: Image size must be less than 2MB

emails.title: Email Addresses
emails.description: Manage email addresses associated with your account
emails.addDescription: Add a new email address to your account
emails.emailExists: This email is already in use
emails.checkEmailDescription: We've sent a verification link to your email address
emails.checkInbox: Check your inbox and click the verification link
emails.verifyingDescription: Please wait while we verify your email address
emails.verificationSuccessDescription: Your email address has been added to your account
emails.removeEmailError: There was an error removing the email. Please try again later.
emails.deleteEmailWarning: Are you sure you want to delete this email address? This action cannot be undone.
emails.setPrimaryDescription: Are you sure you want to set this email address as your primary email?
emails.setPrimaryError: There was an error setting the primary email. Please try again later.
emails.retryVerifyAfter: Please wait {{seconds}} seconds before retrying verification.
emails.emailNotVerified: Email is not verified. Please verify it before setting as primary.

sessions.title: Active Sessions
sessions.description: Manage devices and sessions where you're signed in
sessions.revokeError: There was an error signing out of the session. Please try again later.
sessions.signOutAllError: There was an error signing out of all sessions. Please try again later.

danger.title: Danger Zone
danger.logoutAllDesc: Log out of all other active sessions on other devices
danger.deleteAccountWarning: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.
danger.deleteAccountDesc: Permanently delete the account and remove access from all workspaces
danger.deleteSuccess: Your account has been successfully deleted.
danger.deleteError: There was an error deleting your account. Please try again later.

language.title: Language & Region
language.description: Customize language, timezone and date formats

email.title: Email Notifications
email.newWorkspaceDesc: Get notified when someone creates a new workspace
email.invitationDesc: Receive emails when you're invited to a workspace
email.taskAssignedDesc: Get notified when a task is assigned to you
email.weeklySummaryDesc: Get a weekly digest of your workspace activity

push.title: Push Notifications
push.messagesDesc: Get notified when someone sends you a message
push.taskUpdatesDesc: Receive notifications for task status changes
push.mentionsDesc: Get notified when someone mentions you
push.remindersDesc: Receive reminders for upcoming tasks and events

inApp.title: In-App Notifications
inApp.enableAllDesc: Show notifications for all activities within the app

apps.title: Apps & Integrations
apps.description: Connect your favorite apps to enhance your workflow

invite.title: Invite Team Members
invite.description: Invite new members to collaborate in your workspace
